thread.title: Sony Pikachu with octa-core CPU, 21MP camera, and Android Nougat spotted on GFXBench
thread.title_full: Sony Pikachu with octa-core CPU, 21MP camera, and Android Nougat spotted on GFXBench

title: Sony Pikachu with octa-core CPU, 21MP camera, and Android Nougat spotted on GFXBench
text:
Sony Android 
A new Sony smartphone has been spotted on GFXBench. Dubbed Pikachu , the phone - the listing reveals - is powered by MediaTek MT6757 Helio P20 SoC with octa-core 2.3GHz processor, and sports a 5-inch HD display. 
RAM is 3GB, while internal memory should be 32GB. In terms of camera, the handset features a 21MP rear unit, while the front shooter should be of 8MP. The device runs Android Nougat (version 7.0) out of the box. 
The Pikachu could well be the Sony G3112 that has been the subject of a few leaks until now, and is rumored to be powered by Helio P20 chipset and sport a 1280x720 pixel display.
